# AVPlayerItem.Status.readyToPlay

**Case**

The item is ready to play.

## Declaration

```swift
case readyToPlay
```

## Player item statuses

- **AVPlayerItem.Status.unknown**: The item’s status is unknown.
- **AVPlayerItem.Status.failed**: The item no longer plays due to an error.

items.description: The item no longer plays due to an error.
items.name: AVPlayerItem.Status.failed
